title: I Became A Professional Triangle Player For 12 Seconds
description: In this video, Max Fosh attempts to become a professional triangle player for just 12 seconds.
summary: Max Fosh tries his hand at becoming a professional triangle player in a short amount of time.
payoff: The payoff comes when Max Fosh successfully becomes a professional triangle player for 12 seconds before being cut off, highlighting the ridiculousness of the whole endeavor.
